directions: Combine diced tomatoes, eggplant, yellow squash, zucchini, water, onion, sliced mushrooms, olive oil, garlic, oregano, and salt in a 6-quart slow cooker.
Cook on Low until eggplant is tender, about 8 hours.
ingredients: 1 eggplant, peeled, quartered, and cut into rounds
1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms with juice
title: Eggplant Stew
